mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Will pay off bonds due, but not before April or possibly May. Colonel Monroe is expected and will hopefully settle Short's "affair." Loves the peace and friendly society of Monticello, but his love of France and "sauce a l'Orleans" remains with him.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Monroe, James, 1758-1831
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1815 March 25, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia], to [William] Short, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania].
